summary: Always evolving software developer, promoter of open-source initiatives, agnostic towards programming languages and frameworks.
passion: Passionate about working with creative and innovative professionals for fast, efficient and scalable solutions.

roles.title: Teacher Assistant
roles.description: Assistance and preparation of a bootcamp course, teaching Full Stack Web Development in Javascript using the MERN technology stack.

roles.title: Web Consultant
roles.description: In charge of planning, taking decissions about the technology to be used and manage projects. This job position required to have knowledge such as PHP, Wordpress, Javascript, and be able to write the code if neccessary.

roles.title: Freelance Web Applications Developer
roles.description: Design, development, testing and implementation of custom web applications for a variety of individuals, startups and organizations, covering a wide range of tech solutions.

roles.title: Intern Developer SAPUI5
roles.description: Internship at SofOS, a SAP Gold Partner. Designed, developed, tested and implemented a planning application for the poultry industry, used for supervising fooding, sanitizing and transporting plans of live chickens in multiple warehouses connected by SAP/HANA Cloud technologies, using the SAPUI5 front-end library.

roles.title: IT Technician & Project Manager
roles.description: Provided multiple types of support in productive, administrative and IT operations. Also planned, managed and supervised different improvement projects for the company, while reporting directly to  the senior staff.
